Class HEM_Lattice

java.lang.Object
  wblut.hemesh.modifiers.HEM_Modifier
      wblut.hemesh.modifiers.HEM_Lattice
All Implemented Interfaces:
HE_Manipulator
public class HEM_Lattice
extends HEM_Modifier

Turns a solid into a rudimentary ribbed structure.

Author:
Frederik Vanhoutte (W:Blut)
